scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary seated and holding the Christ Child, who is dressed in red. To the right, an angel with blue wings stands and plays a harp. In the foreground, a kneeling woman in a pink gown and black headdress gestures towards the Virgin and Child. The figures are situated within an architectural setting that includes a bed with red drapery and a green canopy on the left, and a wall with arched windows on the right. The floor is a green and white checkered pattern. The overall scene is framed by an arched border decorated with floral motifs.
